name: "History in the Making": The First Three Years
overview: History in the Making is a collection of fifteen games from U.S. Gold's catalog of American imports: - Beach-Head - Beach-Head II: The Dictator Strikes Back - Bruce Lee - Express Raider - Gauntlet - The Goonies - Impossible Mission - Infiltrator - Kung-Fu Master - Leaderboard - Raid Over Moscow - Road Runner - Spy Hunter - Super Cycle - World Games
